text:
The two of you
are so cute together.
Uh, thanks?

You guys make
a good couple.

We're not a couple.
We're partners.
Ah, love is great.

I don't believe this.
What is with everybody today?
We are not in love!

You can't deny it.
It's in the news!
What?

Cat Noir, can I have
an autograph?

Ladybug and Cat Noir
voted Couple of the Year?

"They share more than
just their love of justice."
What the heck is going on?

This is proof that
my ice cream is right.

You two are made for each other,
like chocolate

- and strawberry.
- This is baloney!

All these photos have
been taken out of context.

We were fighting
supervillains.

This one is me
breaking Cat Noir

out of Dark Cupid's spell,
and this one--

we can't even
remember this one

because the villain
erased our memories!

Of course. It's always
the supervillain's fault!

But what the mind forgets,
the heart remembers!
Maybe he's right, milady.
After all, he's still Andre,

the Sweethearts'
ice cream maker.
Cat Noir, not now!
( grunting )

- ( roars )
- Hey, maybe if we kiss again,

- our memories would come back.
- Ugh, enough!

Why don't you take
a little cat nap?

And as for you, you big
two-legged ice cream cone,

hand over that akuma-tized
scooper right now!
Ladybug: Lucky charm!
A fire extinguisher, okay.
Add this thing and that one.

- Andre: No!
- ( thud )

Time to de-evilize.
Miraculous Ladybug!

It just doesn't make sense.
My ice cream is never wrong.

Ladybug and Cat Noir
are made for each other!

I guess ice cream,
just like tabloids,
can be wrong sometimes.
Ugh.
Aah! Whoa, whoa!
Aah!

I guess I'm not your favorite
cat at the moment, am I?

Can I take you out to a movie
to make up for it?

Or how about
a restaurant to celebrate

our nomination as
Couple of the Year?

We're not Couple of the Year.
We're not a couple at all!

Sorry, sorry. I didn't
mean to make you so mad.

I get it.
You're sick of me.

I must sound like
a broken record,

expressing my affection
for you over and over.

I know I should stop,
but I can't help it, you know?

I have so many feelings
welled up in this heart,

and I don't know
how to control them.

I know your heart's
in the right place

and that you don't
mean any harm, but...

You're right. You shouldn't
have to put up with this.

I'll stop. I don't know how yet,
but I'll figure it out.
I promise.
I'm counting on you.
I'll see you later.
